text: Kɨ Kraisɨn adarazir gumazir dapanim. Nɨ amizir God inabazim, kɨ nɨ ko nɨn boriba bagha akɨnafarir kam osiri. Kɨ guizbangɨra bar ia gifonge. Kɨ uabɨra puvatɨ, gumazamizir guizɨn akam gɨfoziba uaghan bar ia gifonge.(1) Jon akar isɨn zuim gami. Amizir God inabazim, a siosɨn mam. Borir kaba, me siosɨn kamɨn aven itir gumazamiziba.
